00037 #ifndef EGS_POLYGON_
00038 #define EGS_POLYGON_

00047 
00057 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_2DPolygon {
00058 
00059 public:
00060 
00068     EGS_2DPolygon(vector<EGS_2DVector> &points, bool Open=false);
00069 
00071     ~EGS_2DPolygon();
00072 
00074     int getN() const { return np-1; };
00075 
00077     bool isConvex() const { return is_convex; };
00078 
00080     EGS_2DVector getNormal(int j) const {
00081         if( j >= 0 && j < np-1 ) return a[j]; else return EGS_2DVector();
00082     };
00083 
00089     EGS_Float hownear(bool in, const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00090         if( !open ) {
00091             EGS_Float tperp = 1e30; bool do_it = true;
00092             for(int j=0; j<np-1; j++) {
00093                 EGS_2DVector v(x - p[j]);
00094                 EGS_Float lam = uj[j]*v;
00095                 if( lam >= 0 && lam <= uj[j].length2() ) {
00096                     do_it = false; EGS_Float t = fabs(d[j] - x*a[j]);
00097                     if( t < tperp ) tperp = t;
00098                 }
00099                 else if( lam < 0 && do_it ) {
00100                     EGS_Float t = v.length(); if( t < tperp ) tperp = t;
00101                 }
00102                 else do_it = true;
00103             }
00104             return tperp;
00105         }
00106         EGS_2DVector v(x - p[0]); EGS_Float lam = uj[0]*v;
00107         EGS_Float tperp; bool do_it;
00108         if( lam <= uj[0].length2() ) {
00109             do_it = false; tperp = fabs(d[0] - x*a[0]);
00110         } else { do_it = true; tperp = 1e30; }
00111         v = x - p[1]; lam = uj[1]*v;
00112         if( lam >= 0 ) {
00113             EGS_Float t = fabs(d[1] - x*a[1]);
00114             if( t < tperp ) tperp = t;
00115         }
00116         else if( do_it ) {
00117             EGS_Float t = v.length(); if( t < tperp ) tperp = t;
00118         }
00119         return tperp;
00120     };
00121 
00123     bool isInside(const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00124         if( !open &&
00125             (x.x<xmin || x.x>xmax || x.y<ymin || x.y>ymax) ) return false;
00126         if( is_convex ) {
00127             int nn = open ? np-2 : np-1;
00128             for(int j=0; j<nn; j++)
00129                 if( !inside(j,x) ) return false;
00130             return true;
00131         }
00132         if( !cpol->isInside(x) ) return false;
00133         for(int j=0; j<ncut; j++) if( cut[j]->isInside(x) ) return false;
00134         return true;
00135     };
00136 
00148     bool howfar(bool in, const EGS_2DVector &x, const EGS_2DVector &u,
00149                 EGS_Float &t, EGS_2DVector *normal = 0) {
00150         EGS_Float xp, up; bool res = false;
00151         int nn = open ? np-2 : np-1;
00152         if( in ) {
00153             int jhit;
00154             for(int j=0; j<nn; j++)  {
00155                 if( (up = u*a[j]) < 0 && (xp = x*a[j]) > d[j] ) {
00156                     EGS_Float tt = d[j] - xp;
00157                     if( tt >= t*up ) {
00158                         tt /= up;
00159                         bool ok = is_convex || pc[j];
00160                         if( !ok ) {
00161                             EGS_Float lam = uj[j]*(x-p[j]+u*tt);
00162                             if( lam >= 0 && lam < uj[j].length2() ) ok = true;
00163                         }
00164                         if( ok ) {
00165                             t = tt; res = true; jhit = j;
00166                             //if( normal ) *normal = a[j];
00167                         }
00168                     }
00169                 }
00170             }
00171             if( res && normal ) *normal = a[jhit];
00172         }
00173         else {
00174             int jhit;
00175             if( open ) {
00176                 if( (up = u*a[0]) > 0 && (xp = x*a[0]) < d[0] ) {
00177                     EGS_Float tt = (d[0] - xp)/up;
00178                     if( tt <= t ) {
00179                         EGS_Float lam = uj[0]*(x-p[0]+u*tt);
00180                         if( lam < uj[0].length2() ) {
00181                             t = tt; res = true; jhit = 0;
00182                         }
00183                     }
00184                 }
00185                 if( (up = u*a[1]) > 0 && (xp = x*a[1]) < d[1] ) {
00186                     EGS_Float tt = (d[1] - xp)/up;
00187                     if( tt <= t ) {
00188                         EGS_Float lam = uj[1]*(x-p[1]+u*tt);
00189                         if( lam > 0 ) {
00190                             t = tt; res = true; jhit = 1;
00191                         }
00192                     }
00193                 }
00194             }
00195             else {
00196                 for(int j=0; j<nn; j++)  {
00197                     if( (up = u*a[j]) > 0 && (xp = x*a[j]) < d[j] ) {
00198                         EGS_Float tt = (d[j] - xp)/up;
00199                         if( tt <= t ) {
00200                             EGS_Float lam = uj[j]*(x-p[j]+u*tt);
00201                             if( lam >= 0 && lam < uj[j].length2() ) {
00202                                 t = tt; res = true; jhit = j;
00203                                 //if( normal ) *normal = a[j]*(-1);
00204                             }
00205                         }
00206                     }
00207                 }
00208             }
00209             if( res && normal ) *normal = a[jhit]*(-1);
00210         }
00211         return res;
00212     };
00213 
00215     EGS_2DVector getPoint(int j) const {
00216         if( j >= 0 && j < np ) return p[j]; else return EGS_2DVector();
00217     };
00218 
00219 
00220 private:
00221 
00222     EGS_2DVector *p;   
00223     EGS_2DVector *a;   
00224     EGS_2DVector *uj;  
00225     EGS_Float    *d;   
00226     bool         *pc;  
00227 
00228     EGS_Float    xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax;
00229     int          np;   
00230     bool         is_convex; 
00231     bool         open; 
00234     int          ncut;  
00236     EGS_2DPolygon  **cut; 
00237     EGS_2DPolygon  *cpol; 
00238 
00241     static bool checkCCW(const vector<EGS_2DVector> &points);
00243     bool inside(int j, const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00244         if( x*a[j] >= d[j] ) return true; else return false;
00245     };
00246 
00247 };
00248 
00263 template <class T>
00264 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_PolygonT {
00265 
00266 public:
00267 
00274     EGS_PolygonT(vector<EGS_2DVector> &points, const T &projector,
00275          bool Open=false) : p(new EGS_2DPolygon(points,Open)), a(projector) {};
00276 
00278     ~EGS_PolygonT() { delete p; };
00279 
00281     inline bool isConvex() const { return p->isConvex(); };
00282 
00284     inline int getN() const { return p->getN(); };
00285 
00287     inline EGS_Vector getPoint(int j) const {
00288         return a.getPoint(p->getPoint(j));
00289     };
00290 
00292     inline EGS_Vector getNormal() const { return a.normal(); };
00293 
00295     inline EGS_Vector getNormal(const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00296         return a.normal(x);
00297     };
00298 
00300     inline EGS_Vector getNormal(int j) const {
00301         return a.normal(p->getNormal(j));
00302     };
00303 
00305     inline EGS_2DVector getProjection(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00306         return a.getProjection(x);
00307     };
00308 
00310     inline EGS_Float distance(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00311         return a.distance(x);
00312     };
00313 
00315     inline bool isInside2D(const EGS_2DVector &xp) const {
00316         return p->isInside(xp);
00317     };
00318 
00321     inline bool isInside2D(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00322         return p->isInside(a.getProjection(x));
00323     };
00324 
00327     inline bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00328         return (a.distance(x) >= 0);
00329     };
00330 
00333     inline EGS_Float hownear2D(bool in, const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00334         return p->hownear(in,a.getProjection(x));
00335     };
00336 
00339     inline EGS_Float hownear(bool in, const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00340         EGS_2DVector pos(a.getProjection(x));
00341         EGS_Float t1 = fabs(a.distance(x));
00342         if( p->isInside(pos) ) return t1;
00343         EGS_Float t2 = p->hownear(true,pos);
00344         return sqrt(t1*t1+t2*t2);
00345     };
00346 
00352     inline bool howfar2D(bool in, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00353                        EGS_Float &t, EGS_2DVector *normal = 0) const {
00354         EGS_2DVector dir(a.getProjection(u));
00355         if( u.length2() < 1e-8 ) return false;
00356         return p->howfar(in,a.getProjection(x),dir,t,normal);
00357     };
00358 
00365     inline bool howfar(bool in, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00366                        EGS_Float &t) const {
00367         EGS_Float up = a*u;
00368         if( in && up >= 0  || !in && up <= 0 ) return false;
00369         EGS_Float tt = -a.distance(x)/up;
00370         if( tt <= t ) {
00371             EGS_Vector xp(x + u*tt);
00372             if( p->isInside(a.getProjection(xp)) ) { t = tt; return true; }
00373         }
00374         return false;
00375     };
00376 
00378     const string &getType() const { return a.getType(); };
00379 
00380 private:
00381 
00382     EGS_2DPolygon *p;
00383     T             a;
00384 
00385 };

00388 typedef EGS_PolygonT<EGS_XProjector> EGS_PolygonYZ;
00390 typedef EGS_PolygonT<EGS_YProjector> EGS_PolygonXZ;
00392 typedef EGS_PolygonT<EGS_ZProjector> EGS_PolygonXY;
00394 typedef EGS_PolygonT<EGS_Projector>  EGS_Polygon;
